200 College Students Earn Part Way

Despite Depression, Miss Pierce Says.

~1111 111‘ 1 1 1
"11 1 1 11111 1 ‘11. . . i
11 1- 21111111 11 111 1 1
1111.‘ 111 .111 111111111

. 1. 11.111 1111111 . 1 . 11

1I11.1‘.1111.1111 .1 11111 11 111.11 1 1111

1

1111111 1.1111I1 11111111511111.1111.1-.
